keyMoments.title: Accidentally Invokes the Buster Call
keyMoments.description: While attempting to contact CP9 agents, Spandam mistakenly picks up the Golden Den Den Mushi instead of his regular transponder snail and accidentally triggers the Buster Call on Enies Lobby.
keyMoments.significance: This catastrophic mistake demonstrates Spandam's incompetence and sets in motion the complete destruction of Enies Lobby, creating a critical time limit for all ongoing battles.

reveals.information: Accidentally triggers the Buster Call on Enies Lobby

keyMoments.title: Recognizes the Buster Call Connection to Ohara
keyMoments.description: Upon seeing the Golden Den Den Mushi activated, Robin flashes back to the destruction of Ohara, recognizing this as the same weapon that destroyed her homeland 20 years ago.
keyMoments.significance: This moment connects Robin's traumatic past to her present crisis, highlighting the cyclical nature of the World Government's violence and deepening the emotional stakes of the rescue mission.

reveals.information: Experiences trauma upon recognizing the Buster Call as the weapon that destroyed Ohara

keyMoments.title: Begins Rematch Against Rob Lucci
keyMoments.description: Luffy confronts Rob Lucci in a storage room within the Tower of Justice and begins their climactic battle, exchanging devastating blows.
keyMoments.significance: This marks the beginning of the most important fight of the Enies Lobby arc. The outcome will determine whether the Straw Hats can save Robin and escape before the Buster Call destroys the island.

keyMoments.title: Begins Climactic Battle Against Luffy
keyMoments.description: Rob Lucci faces off against Luffy in the Tower of Justice, beginning the decisive battle between CP9's strongest agent and the Straw Hat captain.
keyMoments.significance: This is the main event of the Enies Lobby arc - the showdown between Luffy and the most powerful CP9 agent that will determine the fate of Robin and the entire rescue mission.

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Monster Point Rampage Continues
keyMoments.description: Chopper continues his uncontrollable rampage through the Tower of Justice in his Monster Point form, attacking friend and foe alike including Franky.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the dangerous drawback of Chopper's most powerful form and shows how desperate the Straw Hats' situation has become. His lack of control creates additional chaos during the crisis.

keyMoments.title: Continues Fighting While Handcuffed to Usopp
keyMoments.description: Zoro fights against both Kaku and Jabra while handcuffed to Usopp with seastone cuffs, forced to use his crewmate as an improvised weapon.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Zoro's adaptability as a swordsman, forced to modify his three-sword style in creative ways while handicapped. The comedic yet dangerous situation adds difficulty to an already challenging two-on-two battle.

keyMoments.title: Fights While Handcuffed to Zoro
keyMoments.description: Usopp (as Sogeking) is forced to fight alongside Zoro while handcuffed together with seastone cuffs, being used as an improvised weapon against Kaku and Jabra.
keyMoments.significance: Places Usopp in a uniquely challenging position, having to coordinate with Zoro in an unconventional fighting style while facing two powerful CP9 agents.

keyMoments.title: Continues Battle Against Kalifa
keyMoments.description: Nami persists in her difficult battle against CP9's Kalifa, who has been using her Devil Fruit powers to drain Nami's strength.
keyMoments.significance: Represents Nami's growth as a fighter and her determination to protect her crew member Robin. It's one of the key individual matchups during the Enies Lobby arc climax.

keyMoments.title: Knocked Over by Monster Chopper
keyMoments.description: Franky is knocked over by the rampaging Monster Point Chopper, demonstrating the danger that the berserk reindeer poses even to allies.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that Chopper in Monster Point cannot distinguish between friend and foe, creating an additional hazard for the Straw Hats and their allies.
